title: Detox Crystal Healing Kit
description: Do you know someone who needs to detox? This crystal kit will show them how to use an amethyst crystal to keep the mind and body focused on the healthy things in life. This is an innovative product of Gift Republic. Designed in house at our facilities in the United Kingdom.
